title: Monotype’s Quire Sans typeface is an intuitive blend of old & new
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322034503im_/http:/typophile.com/files/QuireSansGraphic1_edit_4135.jpg)

Inspired by the classic proportions of traditional book typography, and crafted for today’s digital landscape, the newest release from the Monotype Studio is the [Quire Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322034503/http:/www.monotype.com/studio/quire-sans/)™ typeface. Designed by Jim Ford, the family of 20 fonts is a typeface for all media, suitable for everything from branding, advertising and packaging, to displays, user interfaces, billboards, signage and environmental graphics.

See the Quire Sans digital specimen: [http://www.monotype.com/studio/quire-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322034503/http:/www.monotype.com/studio/quire-sans/ "http://www.monotype.com/studio/quire-sans/")  
Download the typeface: [http://www.fonts.com/font/monotype/quire-sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322034503/http:/www.fonts.com/font/monotype/quire-sans "http://www.fonts.com/font/monotype/quire-sans")  
Read the press release: [http://bit.ly/1nb5qoo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322034503/http:/bit.ly/1nb5qoo "http://bit.ly/1nb5qoo")
author: Monotype
